    ServerController​(Socket s)

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerController

      public ServerController​(boolean real)
      Parameters:
      real - if true create a real controller(with clientHandlers) if false an emptyController for accept Login in waitingRoom

    • ServerController

      public ServerController​(Socket s)
      Fake controller constructor, it allow to save socket of client inside waiting room to understand his actions (eg recive login,singleLogin,reconnect)
      Parameters:
      s - socket of waitingRoom

      Parameters:
      matchId - assiged id

      public long getMatchId()
      Returns:
      the id assegated to this match

      public void warning​(String msg)

    • broadcastMessage

      public void broadcastMessage​(int except, Packet message)
      Send a broadcast to all clients (except sender)
      Parameters:
      except - if -1 send message also to itself
      message - packet to broadcast

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient​(int index)
      Remove client logged but disconnected before start (change also index of others clinetHandlers to match pings packet)
      Parameters:
      index - index of this client in the client handler list

    • setSinglePlayer

      public void setSinglePlayer()
      "fake" controller need this function to "notify" waiting room that user logged as single player method used by "LoginSinglePlayer"

    • isSinglePlayer

      public boolean isSinglePlayer()
      method used by waiting room to check if user logged as single player to "fake controler"
      Returns:
      return true if user logged as single player

    • getClients

      public List<ClientHandler> getClients()
      Returns:
      the list of clients connected to this match

      public void addClient​(ClientHandler client)
      add a player to the match
      Parameters:
      client - client to add

    • dashReset

      public void dashReset​(int index)
      Reset player dashboard gained resources whenever user produce with a card obtained mat are inserted into a "turnGain" list and when production card check if can activate itself exclude those resources from the available one
      Parameters:
      index - client index of sender

      Parameters:
      pos -
      clientIndex -

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()

    • initializeMinimodel

      public void initializeMinimodel() throws FullDepositException, WrongPosition, NoBonusDepositOwned
      Generate MiniPlayers, add cheat and draw them 4 leaders each then send to clients "gameStarted" packet with minimodel data
      Throws:
      FullDepositException
      WrongPosition
      NoBonusDepositOwned

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws Exception
      Start the game (called from StartGame packet) Send a broadcast to all player with "GAME STARTED" packet (and remove from clientApp the line with automatic start sender)
      Throws:
      Exception - (if game cant start)

    • generateGameStartedPacket

      public Packet generateGameStartedPacket​(MiniPlayer[] players, int index)
      Generate entire minimodel/miniplayers for the "startGame" packet (sended only the first time then update only changed parts)
      Parameters:
      index - player index inside game
      Returns:
      game started packet

    • addCheat

      public void addCheat() throws WrongPosition, NoBonusDepositOwned, FullDepositException
      Add cheat to player (for debug purpose) if Debug infinite resouces flag is true add to all players 100 resources of all type and fullify storage
      Throws:
      WrongPosition
      NoBonusDepositOwned
      FullDepositException

    • generateMiniPlayer

      public MiniPlayer[] generateMiniPlayer() throws FullDepositException, NoBonusDepositOwned, WrongPosition
      Returns:
      a list of miniplayer to send to the client to VIEW purpose is a reduced version of Game model
      Throws:
      FullDepositException
      NoBonusDepositOwned
      WrongPosition

    • checkPapalSpaceActivation

      public void checkPapalSpaceActivation()
      check papalspace position and send users update relatives to their papal spaces

    • turnNotifier

      public void turnNotifier()
      send turn packet to the next player and notify the other withthe name of current player

    • isRightPlayer

      public boolean isRightPlayer​(int playerIndex)
      Check if the player that send the command is the current player
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - index of the packet sender
      Returns:
      true if is the current player

      index - controller index

      a response packet (only if exception occur)

      Returns:

      y - color
      pos - where i want to put the card

    • MoveResources

      public Packet MoveResources​(int pos1, int pos2, int q, int player)
      same as swap but allow to transfer a specific resource quantity from a deposit A to a deposit B
      Parameters:
      pos1 - start deposit
      pos2 - dest deposit
      q - quantity to move
      player - client index

    • marketExtraction

      public Packet marketExtraction​(boolean direction, int pos, int player)
      Parameters:
      direction - row or column (row = false,col = true)
      pos - row/col position of the market
      player - packet sender
      Returns:
      a packet containing the resources extracted and eventual "whiteballs" to ask the user

    • isPaused

      public boolean isPaused()
      Returns:
      true if all player was disconnected (if true the recconnect packet will load game from file)

    • saveGameState

      public void saveGameState()
      Save Game state for the "evryOneDisconnected" or "serverCrush" possibility

    • checkClientsStateReconnecting

      public void checkClientsStateReconnecting()
      When reconnecting a player check if other player have invalid socket (to avoid using null socket)

    • nextTurn

      public Packet nextTurn()
      if end condition are true send to all a "last Turn" packet if the current player is 4 and the match is ended then send an "end game" packet to all if nor of prewious is true then send a message "typeTurn" to the next player
      Returns:
      null

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Broadcast endgame packet

    • exstractScore

      public int[] exstractScore()
      Extract from game the charts
      Returns:
      charts of player

    • exstractCharts

      public String[] exstractCharts()
      Extract from game the charts
      Returns:
      charts of player

    • lastTurn

      public void lastTurn()
      Broadcast lastTurn packet

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(Packet p, int index)

    • reconnect

      public ClientHandler reconnect​(Socket socket, String nickname)
      try to reconnect socket to this match
      Parameters:
      socket - client new socket
      nickname - user who try to reconnect

    • setReconnect

      public void setReconnect​(String nickname, long id)
      if waiting room recive a reconnect packet it affect the fake controller by setting true this flag

    • exitPause

      public void exitPause()
      when user reconnect to an offline match the server will load from file if this happen this function allow to change Paused stato to false and search an onlyne player

    • exitPauseOnline

      public void exitPauseOnline()
      if users try to reconnect to a paused game thats already loaded/online this function change only the boolean state Else if try to reconnect to an offline match is called exitPause() (that will do other operations)

    • setPaused

      public void setPaused()
      Indicate that now game is in paused mode , it happen when server crush and user reload, or when all player disconnect

    • sendPapalSpaceUptate

      public void sendPapalSpaceUptate​(boolean[] papalToken, int controllerIndex)
      Parameters:
      papalToken - boolean papal token list
      controllerIndex - player controller index
